https://tmrev.io/movie/332718-Bilal: A New Breed of Hero 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ncWuEzxnXqssxRfHghZuUAIezCo.jpg A thousand years ago, one boy with a dream of becoming a great warrior is abducted with his sister and taken to a land far away from home. Thrown into a world where greed and injustice rule all, Bilal finds the courage to raise his voice and make a change. Inspired by true events, this is a story of a real hero who earned his remembrance in time and history. Bilal: A New Breed of Hero
